Package io.cyborgcode.roa.framework.config

Interface FrameworkConfig

All Superinterfaces:
org.aeonbits.owner.Config, Serializable
@LoadPolicy(MERGE) @Sources({"system:properties","classpath:${framework.config.file}.properties"}) public interface FrameworkConfig extends org.aeonbits.owner.Config
Configuration interface for loading framework settings.

This interface defines configuration properties for the framework, allowing dynamic retrieval of essential settings from system properties and external property files.

The configuration is loaded using a merge policy, which combines multiple sources, including system properties and classpath properties.
